entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:02 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
